mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kz_order ( order_id,shop_id,address_id,amount_payment, payment, pick_up, post_free, status, create_time, update_time, payment_time, consign_time, end_time, close_time, shipping_name, shipping_code, user_id, buyer_message, buyer_nick, buyer_rete ) VALUES (#{orderId}, #{shopId}, #{addressId}, #{amountPayment}, #{payment}, #{pickUp}, #{postFree}, #{status}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{paymentTime}, #{consignTime}, #{endTime}, #{closeTime}, #{shippingName}, #{shippingCode}, #{userID}, #{buyerMessage}, #{buyerNick}, #{buyerRate});
mapper.select: select count(1) from kz_order o LEFT JOIN kz_shop s ON o.shop_id = s.id where to_days(o.create_time) = to_days(now()) and shop_id = #{shopId}
mapper.update:
update kz_order
status = #{orderStatus},
payment_time = NOW(),
update_time = NOW()
where order_id = #{orderId}
